name: Borgo
appearance: A thick-necked foreman with heat-reddened cheeks, scarred arms, and a molten-glass burn that glints like amber on his jaw. Keeps tally-chalk behind one ear.
character: Gruff and prideful, loyal to his crew if they follow orders and schedules.
talents: Predicts glass color by flame odor
dreams: Invent a signature emberglass that wins him a partnership
Retire to a warm villa above Emberbank
Outmaneuver the Hearth Union without breaking his crew
secrets: Siphoned profit from scrap channels tied to illegal coin blanks
Owes the Night Orchard for erasing a debt marker
Misdirected a safety inspector with free lantern panes
